configName: Accredited Enrolment Form - Single - No Payment

fields.name: Of the following categories, select the one which best describes the main reason you are undertaking this course?
fields.tooltip: Select the value that best represents the reason for study.

options.display: To try for a different career
To get a better job or promotion
It was a requirement of my job
I wanted extra skills for my job
